rule.condition: not (same(logical.name in $L.file, NULL)) and not (same(logical.name in $L.file, logical.name in $L.file.save))
rule.conditionDesc: ( logical.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND logical.name in CurrentRecord != logical.name in SavedRecord)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Affected CI">logical.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Affected CI">logical.name</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Affected CI">logical.name</FieldName></Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Call the "im.update.affected.services" process. (when ( logical.name in CurrentRecord != NULL AND logical.name in CurrentRecord != logical.name in SavedRecord))
